name: JUMPERMELON!
description:
Oi!

Jumpermelon is a game better played with an audience,

the players don't look at the screen and share the same controller (this build is for 4 players).

listen to your guide or to the audience to know when to jump !

pretty simple right ?

go on then :>

-----

Controls (Xbox 360 Gamepad)

Player 1 -- Left Stick

Player 2 -- Left Pad

Player 3 -- Right Stick

Player 4 -- Y Button

-----

A game by Henri Couvreur, Corinne Fenoglio and Dorian Beaugendre

Special thanks to Hector Bonte's voice

Music: http://www.bensound.com
